None.Name: Tainted Morphing
None.Description:
Activate to
transform an own ground unit within
a 100m range into a Mutating Frenzy
that is not able to distinguish
between friend and foe. Thus it deals
100% more damage but will start
attacking whatever entity is next to it
no matter if it is friendly or hostile. It
cannot be controlled by the player.
Mutating Frenzy has the same
upgrade level as the building itself.
Reusable every 20 seconds.
